events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect product delivery.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’ll assist you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund quickly.
Sure, my order number is 987654321, and I have attached a photo showing the wrong product that arrived.
Thank you for the details. We will start the refund process immediately and you should see the amount back in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund.
The refund has been processed successfully on our end. Please allow a few days for it to reflect in your payment account.
Just checking in to ensure you have received your refund. Please contact us if you have any further questions.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for contacting us, and we hope to assist you again in the future.
We have sent you a satisfaction survey. Your feedback is very important to us to improve our service quality.
